txt.en: A customer at the vendor stall has requested a number of fresh apples.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
'Apples please! Hello, I need apples! And a good number of them, as well. Please get to work right away.\n\n'The crate is somewhere behind your stall there. Move along now -- I do not have all day.'
The apple crate is near the vendor stall in Bywater.\n\nYou should search for apples within the crate to fill this customer's order.
'There you are! Thank you, [placeholder] -- that customer was growing restless. I will get the order to her. I just need to find a bag....'
Daisy Sandyman is in Bywater in the Shire.\n\nYou should deliver the apples you gathered to Daisy Sandyman.
Deliver the apples to Daisy Sandyman at the vendor stall
